bibl.title: The Odes of Epagathus the Choral Flautist: some Documentary Evidence for Dramatic Representation in Roman Egypt.
Proceedings of the XIV International Congress of Papyrologists
bibl.author: Cockle, W.E.H.

bibl.note: Unpublished document from Oxyrhynchus, first/second cent., belonging to the Egypt Exploration Society. Will be republished in the Oxyrhynchus Papyri.
bibl.seg: Cockle W.E.H., The Odes of Epagathus the Choral Flautist: some Documentary Evidence for Dramatic Representation in Roman Egypt.
Proceedings of the XIV International Congress of Papyrologists (London, 1975) pp. 59-65 et pl. XV.
